sentences.sentence: The value of Dutch increase with steady steps between 2010 and 2017; while India and Britain decrease with steady steps between 2010 and 2017.
There is an unusual drop in 2016 of India.

sentences.sentence: The value of Dutch increase with steady steps between 2010 and 2017; while India and Britain decrease with steady steps between 2010 and 2017.
There is an unusual drop in 2016 of India.
